title: OpenType Emoticons
content:
Is there a font out there with an opentype feature that turns :) into a smiley glyph?  
I think that would be a great addition to FF Duper 2.0! lol
author: johnnydib

comments.content:
FF PicLig (a bitmap font) does some things like that I think.  
 [Here's a PDF.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105746/http:/www.fontfont.com/downloads/PicLig-Lesson1.pdf)

My [Facit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105746/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/Facit/index.htm) has these:

\<- ←  
-\> →  
\<-\> ↔  
\<\_ ↑  
\_\> ↓  
\<\_\> ↕  
z\> ↯  
:) ☺  
:( ☹

They're implemented as discretionary ligatures.
